title: [Health] Eyeglasses for students linked to higher test scores, better academic performance. Scientists say the findings could lead to improved learning for millions of children who suffer from vision impairment and lack access to pediatric eye care.

[Health] Study: Graphic health warnings on cigarette packages, if implemented from 2022 to 2100, would be associated with 539,000 smoking-attributable deaths averted and 7.9 million life-years gained, and if implemented in 2012, with 718 000 deaths averted and 11.2 million life-years gained through 2100
